meanings.definition: The process of setting type for printing using photographic techniques.
meanings.sent1: Phototypesettings involves setting type for printing with photographic methods.
meanings.sent2: The phototypesettings of the book made the text clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: I tried to do phototypesettings for my school project, but ended up with blurry text!
meanings.sent4: Her phototypesettings skills were like a magic spell, transforming plain text into beautiful pages.
meanings.sent5: The art of phototypesettings brought the words to life on the page.

meanings.definition: The equipment or process used for phototypesetting.
meanings.sent1: The phototypesettings machine was essential for printing newspapers.
meanings.sent2: We needed to upgrade our phototypesettings equipment to improve printing quality.
meanings.sent3: The phototypesettings device beeped loudly, surprising everyone in the office.
meanings.sent4: The phototypesettings tools were like a symphony orchestra, each playing a crucial role in the printing process.
meanings.sent5: With the phototypesettings gear, we could create professional-looking documents.
